segments.text: My attention is drawn to the left side of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is on a two-step stool, reaching into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly wobbly, its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see it tilting backward precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's definitely going to fall if he's not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand is deep inside a jar labeled "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate with the other hand, perhaps to catch his spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His younger sister stands nearby, looking up eagerly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand raised, clearly expecting a cookie herself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup is just an accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem so focused on their sweet prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still oblivious to this risky endeavor, too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope that stool holds steady for a few more moments.
segments.speaker: PAR
